pages.text: $(l)Meaning:$() Brilliance and Fortitude $(br)$(l)Primary Aspect:$() $(6)All$()$(br)$(l)Obtaining:$() Can only be found in loot chests scattered around the world. You may also ask certain traders if they possess any for trade.
$(o)Diamonds are very powerful crystals, and this crystal glows with an inner purity that is not often seen on more mundane specimens.$()
